document_data.name: Gunther's Kaleidoscopic Strike
document_data.mainbody: '''''Gunther's kaleidoscopic strike''''' was an [[evocation]] [[spell]] used by [[wizard]]s. This spell was developed by [[Gunther]].
document_data.Effects:
This spell shot a beam of multi-colored light from the caster's fingertips toward a target. The spell targeted the magical energy stored within the mind of a wizard or [[priest]], scrambling the energy and erasing it from their mind, causing them to lose a random number of spells they had memorized.

This spell had absolutely no effect on non-spellcasters or creatures that only used innate magical abilities.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components to cast.
